# Copilot Instructions for hmziraq

- This project is a massive SEO-focused Next.js web app for Iraq, supporting Arabic and English.
- The site generates thousands of programmatic pages for every service, business type, and city, targeting all possible business/institutional search queries in Iraq.
- All content, meta tags, and URLs are optimized for Google search and local Iraqi business intent.
- The structure is fully dynamic: `/[lang]/services/[service]/[business]/[city]`.
- Content and keywords are managed in `/src/content/` files for easy expansion.
- The goal is to reach tens of thousands of daily visitors via Google by covering every possible business/service/city combination.
- All new features must preserve SEO scalability, fast performance, and bilingual support.

## Next Steps
- Expand `businessTypes.ts` with more business types and cities.
- Expand `services.ts` with more digital services.
- Add more content and case studies to the blog.
- Monitor Google Analytics and Search Console for new keyword opportunities.
- Continuously improve meta tags, content, and performance.
